+---------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                           | **Sufficient increase in capacity**                               | **Insufficient change in capacity**                               |
+:==========================+:==================================================================+:==================================================================+
| **Priority shifts**       | -   Level of service: $0$ or $\uparrow$                           | -   Level of service: $\downarrow$                                |
|  **to policy work**       | -   Ratio of $\frac{\textrm{policy}}{\text{service}}$: $\uparrow$ | -   Ratio of $\frac{\textrm{policy}}{\text{service}}$: $\uparrow$ |
+---------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
|                           |                                                                   |                                                                   |
+---------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
| **No change**             | -   Level of service: $\uparrow$                                  | -   Level of service: $0$                                         |
| **in priorities**         | -   Ratio of $\frac{\textrm{policy}}{\text{service}}$: $0$        | -   Ratio of $\frac{\textrm{policy}}{\text{service}}$: $0$        |
+---------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------+
